title: About the zed AS nerf
body:
Ok in 5.2 they are nerfing zed's base AS and his AS per level.

So riot, when's the real zed nerfs coming?

replies.body:
I don't see how lowering aspd on zed stops him clearing though. you can full clear a wave with a little ad and pen or get it to within his passives range to never miss anything.

If you wanted to really hurt zed you would change the ad scaling on his abilities,  not his aspd. Or you could make his ult range a lot smaller so it's easier to lane against him without him all inning you as soon as you waste a taunt /damaging ability (but lets hope that doesn't happen because I like zed).{{champion:238}}
I wouldn't ask here go to NA where everyone else has realized that Zed needs real nerfs most of OCE loves Zed the way he is.
I don't. I want Zed to be nerfed slightly more so I don't see him every 2 - 3 games.

As a matter of fact, riot is not trying to nerf zed' assassination abilities, instead they want to nerf his pushing power, as he already has insanely good clearing and escapes, with him being an AD champ, he can split push very well while mirdering any squishies trying to stop him or escaping via shadows. While the AS nerf is kinda pointless for his assassination, it is rather impactful towards attacking towers.

Its a total joke. Its not like most Zed's don't build some attack speed anyway. While this will impact, it isn't going to be a huge impact. if Riot is worried about his auto attacks allowing him to assassinate too easily, they ought to do something about his ult which allows his autos to do that.
Just nerf the amount of bonus damage his ult gets from autos maybe?
